dmca.title: Theft of Intellectual Property
dmca.body:
NC

-----Original Message-----
From: Marc J. Rauch [mailto:marcrauch@earthlink.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2005 3:01 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; admins@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com;
legal-response@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Theft of Intellectual Property

Gentlemen-

You are hosting a series of websites that are stealing copyrighted material 
and using it on their pages.  The sites are part of something called Global 
Wizz and have such URLs as www.mycarszone.com and www.carswizz.com.

I know this for a fact, because they have misappropriated some of my 
work.  They have never requested nor received permission from me or my 
company for its use.  One such example can be found at 
http://www.mycarszone.com/news/news_969.html.

I expect you to take immediate action as your support of their illegal 
action makes you a contributory infringer, and subject to Federal and State 
intellectual property law penalties.

Feel free to call me if you need additional information.

Marc J. Rauch
Exec. Vice President
THE AUTO CHANNEL
916-852-1956
